intent: Test parallel sub-agent spawning with context isolation

success_criteria.primary: Multiple sub-agents fetch different URLs successfully

test_requirements.different_targets: Each sub-agent fetches a different URL
test_requirements.results_collected: Main agent receives results from all sub-agents

isolation_checks.no_context_bleed: Sub-agent A's fetched content not visible to sub-agent B

quality_rubric.correctness: Each sub-agent fetches its assigned URL
